text:
Company Background:
Thomas, Lewis and Martinez is a highly-regarded financial services firm with a dedication to providing exceptional customer service and sound financial guidance. Our team values integrity, transparency, and inclusivity in all our operations.

Job Type:
Full-time Teller

Job Description:
We are seeking a professional and diligent Teller to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for handling cash transactions, providing customer service, and supporting our branch operations. We are committed to maintaining a welcoming and inclusive environment for all our employees.

Responsibilities:
- Perform accurate and efficient cash transactions.
- Address customer inquiries and provide assistance as needed.
- Support financial services and promote our products.
- Maintain a professional appearance and demeanor.
- Ensure adherence to banking regulations and security measures.

Qualifications and Experience:
- High school diploma or equivalent.
- Prior experience in customer service or related roles is advantageous.
- Strong attention to detail and excellent communication skills.
- Ability to maintain good financial practices and handle confidential information.
- Visible tattoos are acceptable if they are not offensive.

Perks and Benefits:
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid time off and holidays.
- Support for substance abuse recovery is available.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $30,000 to $45,000 annually, based on your experience and skills.
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
